fields.description: Currently the projectPath in <extensions/> does not accept ~ or relative paths. Add support.
fields.summary: iOS: Allow relative paths when pointing to an extension project

comments.body:
PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/6682
3_5_X: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/6700
Paths are relative to the titanium project directory.

h5. Steps to test
# Follow the steps in TIMOB-18052 to add an extension to a titanium app
# Use `~` and relative paths to point to the extension

{code}
    <extensions>
        <extension projectPath="~/Downloads/ShareExtension/ShareExtention">ShareTest</extension>
        <extension projectPath="extensions/ShareExtention">TodayTest</extension>
    </extensions>
{code}
